## Client.options() method

Perform a request to get the options of a search engine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
options(hashid: string): Promise<Record<string, any>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hashid | <code>string</code> | A valid hashid for a search engine. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<Record<string, any>>`

A promise to be fullfilled with the response or rejected with a `ClientResponseError`<!-- -->.
